item.title: ROUGHNESS
item.description: TRUE SCRIPTING EFFECT Roughness effect gives an authentic handwritten finish. A cleaner outline and smaller character set is also available.

item.title: RICH VARIANTS
item.description: A balance between regularisation and randomness when creating alternative characters. As you type a letter, each one of the three variants appears in an order that avoids repetition of the same shape, making it appear random.

item.title: Multi-lingual
item.description: The addition of diacritical characters to cover Latin alphabets means it‚Äôs ready to take on broader challenges.

item.title: About
item.description: I’ve always been obsessed with hand writing. Shortly after listening to a talk given by Toshi Omagari on how he made Sir Quentin Blake typeface, it immediately struck me with the gerund of my friend Hehe’s journal as it always gave me a sense of tender & vigor. I spent my last three days carefully crafting these lovely characters and here it is. Thank you Hehe for allowing me to replicate her journal as a typeface and every single friendly and gifted individual at type school :)

item.title: Type School Diary
item.description: #TypeSchool by @3type_cn - DAY ONE - wrote some calligraphy, watched some Hamilton [sic], traced some roman letters, wasted some food. - DAY TWO - quick type sketches, critiques, fake Japanese food, then we hugged good bye to adorkable Toshi. - DAY THREE - more calligraphy, more quick sketches, more type knowledge, getting more serious ü§î - DAY FOUR - latin is not enough. - DAY FIVE - starting to draw sketches for the final assignment.

item.title: Contact
item.description: Currently this font is still under development. If you wish to get the latest version , you can drop me an email. I should be able to reply every evening =)
